channel.title: mobile payments on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in mobile payments on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 BOKU mobile payments Logo
Boku Inc. provides a mobile payments platform headquartered in San Francisco, CA, enabling consumers to pay for goods and services using their mobile phone number, with purchases billed to a consumer’s mobile network operator bill. This form of mobile payment, also referred to as carrier billing, allows unbanked consumers who may have a mobile phone, but no credit card or traditional bank account, to make purchases online, as well as banked customers who simply find carrier billing a simpler way to transact.
You can download theBOKUlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: BOKU
item.description: Boku Inc. provides a mobile payments platform headquartered in San Francisco, CA, enabling consumers to pay for goods and services using their mobile phone number, with purchases billed to a consumer’s mobile network operator bill. This form of mobile payment, also referred to as carrier billing, allows unbanked consumers who may have a mobile phone, but no credit card or traditional bank account, to make purchases online, as well as banked customers who simply find carrier billing a simpler way to transact.
